title: Cursor not right and can't talk in game
body: I don't know what changed. My cursor is usual windows one, not the normal league cursor. When I first right click, in the background it opens a popup with two options, view sources and something else I can't remember. Clicking view source brings up a file in a text document. I can't remember the file name sorry. I can still play, however if I click the point where the popup opens while ingame, it exits down to the desktop and brings it up. I can't type ingame but can still cast spells etc.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like you had something running while you were playing league that was taking priority (focus) from the league window.

Have you experienced this issue since?

Aha! I just looked at it closely and and it has something to do with Discord:  <title>Discord</title>
I guess I'll turn off the overlays, or even turn off discord entirely.

Thanks for the reply
